dmca.title: Trance Music Producer Requests Take Down
dmca.body:
Google,

It's really sad that I have to write a letter to one of the biggest companies in the USA to ask if you would stop profiting from my stolen intellectual property.

These sites are making you money by posting my pirated intellectual property (lyrics) with your ad-words ads:
http://www.euroadrenaline.com/
http://www.trancemusiclyrics.com/
http://www.Odaymp3.net/
http://www.lyricsandsongs.com/song/629998.html http://www.seekalyric.com/browse/Alex_Megane 
http://www.allthelyrics.com/index/a/requested.htm http://www.lyricsfairy.com/contactus.php
http://www.leoslyrics.com/artists/17329/
http://www.sweetslyrics.com/Alex%20Megane.html 
http://www.lyricstime.com/alex-megane-lyrics.html http://www.lyricsspot.com/alex+megane-lyrics-29573.html http://www.cornielyrics.org/lyrics/M/Alex_Megane/192/1_Think_Of You/ http://www.eurodancelyrics.com/modules.php?name=Lyrics&file=lyrics_dance http://www.lyricsfairy.com/Alex-Megane/Hurricane-381285-lyrics.html

please find list attached of the songs whose publishing rights I own -- I own all the copyrights to the lyrics of these songs.


for example all these sites are re-printing the lyrics of Alex Megane "hurricane" without permission.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly in-fringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent. or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.'

alexander perls rousmaniere 
natoarts limited [ascap] 
pens songs [acsap]
